comment.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): The devs says that in order to seed the video, user have to leave browser tab with the video open. And if he close it, video gets deleted. I think this is not good for the peer count/effective.
> Though i think peer tube site is a seeder itself. It appears not to be decentralized platform like ZeroNet is.

you could use the webtorrent desktop client to seed it i tired it and it worked
